about_us.title: About Amanah
description: At Amanah Academy we help you learn Spanish in a dynamic, effective and motivating way. For us, learning a language is not just memorizing rules: it is a cultural experience that connects you with new people, ideas and ways of seeing the world.
Have you studied Spanish for a long time but still don't speak fluently? Here you'll find the confidence and tools to express yourself naturally and without nerves.
Are you a complete beginner? Don't worry: we design lessons tailored to you, adapted to your pace, interests and goals.

focus.title: Our Approach

cards.title: Diverse Teachers
cards.description: Choose from a wide range of teachers, both native and non-native, from different backgrounds and with varied accents, personalities and teaching styles. All follow our method to ensure an effective and enriching learning experience.

cards.title: Personalized Classes
cards.description: Each teacher adapts their lessons to your level, goals and what you enjoy most. You will learn in the way that suits you best, boosting your progress while staying motivated.

cards.title: Flexible Scheduling
cards.description: You decide when to learn. Book your classes at times that suit you best: you will always find teachers available in your time zone.

note: "At Amanah Academy we believe every student is unique. That's why we give you the freedom to choose the teacher who best connects with you and helps you reach your Spanish goals."

articles.title: Articles
summary: Want to try before you decide?

Here are free samples of materials so you can see how we work and start learning right away. Exercises, explanations and practical activities that give you a preview of what you'll experience in class.

standard.title: Standard One-to-One
standard.description: A comprehensive approach to work on grammar, vocabulary, comprehension and production. We don't limit ourselves to verb lists or isolated words: everything is learned in context, with examples and real expressions. We always include dialogues and activities that make the lesson practical and engaging.

conversation.title: Conversation One-to-One
conversation.description: Designed for learners with an intermediate-high level (B1+/B2) who want to focus on speaking. We use dynamics, games and varied topics to keep conversation flowing. Although we don't dive deeply into grammar, we correct and clarify doubts in the moment.

group.title: Group
group.description: The same quality as the standard classes, but in small groups of up to 4 people. Ideal if you're looking for a more economical and collaborative option. They include debates, games and participatory activities. If you can't attend, you'll receive a summary with the content and exercises covered.

info.title: Not sure which plan to choose?
info.description: Curious about learning with us but still hesitating? Don't stay wondering! Try a free class (standard or conversation) with the teacher of your choice and discover why learning Spanish with Amanah Academy is different.

info.title: Want to clear up questions before you start?
info.description: Book a free, no-obligation call with us. We'll explain how our classes work, who our teachers are and answer all your questions about payments, scheduling and guarantees.

courses.title: Courses
summary: Prefer to learn at your own pace?
Our online courses let you study from home, without fixed schedules and with total flexibility.
You will find not only language courses but also ones about culture, gastronomy and other topics that connect you with the Spanish-speaking world.

security.thank_you_title: Thank you for making Amanah Academia safer!
security.thank_you_desc: We deeply appreciate the time, effort, and expertise our researchers have dedicated to improving our platform. Their responsible work has prevented potential incidents and improved the experience for all our users.

header.title: Amanah Academia
header.subtitle: Your privacy and trust are our priority. Learn how we protect your data and your rights.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect and Its Use
informationCollection.content: At Amanah Academia, we collect various types of information to provide you with our educational services: Personal information: Full name, email address, phone number, date of birth. Academic information: Educational history, courses of interest, course progress, grades. Payment information: Data necessary to process your transactions, although complete credit card details are handled by third-party payment processors. Technical data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent on the site, device used. Generated content: Submitted assignments, forum participation, comments, and any other content you create on our platform. We use your information for the following purposes: Provide, maintain, and improve our educational services. Personalize your learning experience according to your interests and progress. Process your payments and manage your subscription. Communicate with you about updates, new courses, or changes to our services. Respond to your inquiries and provide technical support when needed. Conduct internal analysis and studies to improve our platform. Comply with legal and regulatory obligations.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement various security measures to protect your information: Encryption: All data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted using SSL/TLS protocols. Secure storage: Information is stored on secure servers with physical and digital protection measures. Restricted access: Only authorized personnel have access to your information, and only for legitimate purposes. Periodic assessments: We regularly conduct security audits to identify and correct potential vulnerabilities. Backups: We maintain data backups to prevent losses in case of technical incidents. Despite these measures, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure. If we become aware of a security breach, we will notify you in accordance with applicable laws. According to data protection legislation, you have the following rights: Right of access: You can request information about what personal data we have about you. Right to rectification: You can request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete information. Right to erasure: You can request that we delete your personal data under certain circumstances. Right to restriction of processing: You can request that we restrict how we use your data. Right to data portability: You can request that we provide your data in a structured, readable format. Right to object: You can object to the processing of your data for direct marketing purposes. To exercise any of these rights, you can contact us at support@amanahacademia.com. We will respond to your request within a maximum of 30 days.

communications.title: Communications and Newsletter
communications.content: We may use your email to: Send you information about new courses, content updates, and platform improvements. Share learning tips, educational resources, and articles of interest related to your areas of study. Inform you about special promotions, discounts, and educational opportunities. Send you reminders about pending assignments, deadlines, and academic events. You can unsubscribe from these communications at any time by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in each email, or by adjusting your notification preferences in your account settings. In some circumstances, we may share your information with: Service providers: Companies that help us operate our platform (web hosting, payment processing, data analysis, email services). Instructors and teachers: To allow them to evaluate your progress and provide personalized feedback. Legal authorities: When necessary to comply with a legal obligation, regulation, legal process, or government request. Business partners: In cases of joint programs or educational collaborations, always with your prior consent. We never sell your personal information to third parties for commercial purposes.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to: Remember your preferences and settings. Authenticate your session and keep it active while browsing our platform. Analyze how you interact with our services to improve their functionality. Personalize content according to your interests and browsing behavior. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our platform. Amanah Academia operates globally, so your information may be transferred and processed in countries outside your own. These countries may have data protection laws different from your jurisdiction. When we transfer your information to other countries, we implement appropriate security measures, such as standard contractual clauses, to ensure your data receives a level of protection equivalent to that required in your country of residence.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period. Generally, we keep your information while your account is active or as needed to provide you with services. Once the relationship ends, we may retain certain information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of material changes to this policy by publishing the new version on our platform and, when required by law, requesting your consent. We recommend reviewing this page periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

platformUse.title: Platform Use
platformUse.content: By registering with Amanah Academia, you agree to use our platform responsibly and in accordance with current legislation. This includes: Providing truthful and updated information during registration and in your profile. Using educational resources solely for your personal learning. Not sharing your access credentials with third parties. Respecting the intellectual property rights of the provided materials. Not performing activities that may damage, overload, or impair the platform's functioning. Maintaining respectful conduct in forums and communication spaces. We reserve the right to suspend or cancel your account if you violate these terms of use.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All educational content, materials, software, and other intellectual property present in Amanah Academia are the exclusive property of our company or our licensors, unless otherwise indicated. By accessing our courses, you obtain a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the materials for personal educational purposes. This license does not include: The right to redistribute, publish, transmit, or publicly display the materials. The right to modify, adapt, or create derivative works based on our content. The right to use the content for commercial purposes or to teach third parties. Content you create and share on our platform (such as assignments or forum participation) will remain your property, but you grant us a license to use it in the context of our educational services.

liabilityLimitation.title: Liability Limitation
liabilityLimitation.content: Amanah Academia strives to provide high-quality educational services, but we cannot guarantee specific learning outcomes or academic success. We are not responsible for: Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services. Service interruptions due to maintenance, updates, or causes beyond our control. The accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of educational content provided by third-party instructors. Misuse that users may make of information acquired in our courses. Our total liability to you for any claim related to our services will not exceed the total amount paid by you to Amanah Academia during the six months preceding the claim.

paymentsSubscriptions.title: Payments and Subscriptions
paymentsSubscriptions.content: Access to some courses and features of Amanah Academia requires payment of fees. By making a payment, you agree to: Pay all applicable fees within established deadlines. Provide accurate and updated payment information. Authorize us to charge the provided payment method for corresponding amounts. Subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of each billing period, unless you cancel your subscription before the renewal date. We offer a 14-day refund guarantee for most of our courses, subject to our specific refund terms.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
applicableLaw.content: These terms will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Spain, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. In case of any dispute related to these terms or our services, we agree to first attempt to resolve it through direct negotiation. If we do not reach a resolution within 60 days, both parties agree to submit the dispute to mediation before initiating any judicial proceeding. Any controversy not resolved through negotiation or mediation will be resolved by the competent courts of Madrid, Spain.

usageLicense.title: Usage License
usageLicense.content: By registering with Amanah Academia, you are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use our services for personal educational purposes, in accordance with these terms. This license includes: Access to courses you have enrolled in during the validity period of your subscription. Right to view, stream, and download (when available) content for your personal use. Ability to participate in discussion forums and interactive activities related to your courses. This license automatically terminates if you breach these terms or when you decide to cancel your account.

restrictions.content: The following is strictly prohibited: Copying, reproducing, distributing, transmitting, or disseminating any content from our courses without express written authorization. Modifying, adapting, translating, or creating derivative works based on our content. Using our materials to teach third parties or for commercial purposes. Using robots, spiders, or other automated means to access our services.
